subject: Re: Important Message to all,
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Question:

I don't hear most of the files you post, but you hear them so clearly.  The only way to validate what you hear is true, would be to follow up with something that you got that actually happened.

Have you ever heard a message that came true that nobody else heard, basically validating your experience?

-Steve



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> I keep getting these messages that this  Egyptian thing will escalate into 
> a big war, but some of us will not be  here to see it due to the 
> resurrection aka rapture.  Go on and laugh,  but don't say I didn't let you all know, 
> not going to say anymore, ( I know,  what a relief ! right?), we all know in 
> our hearts how we feel about  things.  I keep getting these kind of 
> messages, and so feel compelled to  let everyone know.  I was also told those that 
> are stuck here, will be  stuck here for almost 3 years, and will be those 
> that don't believe in what JC  did for them.  These spirits insist that He is 
> the only way to life.   sf
>
